Text: Todule̩ oñ a ma arailo n dagba kʼile̩-i ki murida,
dagba omi-wñ ki chʼekuku kʼi la wuwowo,
Ohiminiʼka do̩mo̩ kʼaji aji-wñ aje̩ ñw e̩do̩ abo ewo O̩jo̩ ki bo̩, uña kiafo̩ ugbo kʼO̩jo̩ Chamachala gugu le̩.
O̩jo̩ dʼalumeji-wñ, ma achʼo iche̩ n;
Abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi mudutu, ojane̩ ojane̩ chane̩ emiejo;
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du dʼugbo wa;
I aje̩ ñw ogu eja ki we gbogbo tʼukpoji ane̩-ile̩;
We ta, ku me̩ ki ma ka kʼomi chʼO̩jo̩
Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du dʼugbo wa;
